name: Abyssal Nail Ornament
description: Upon attack, deals P.DMG equal to 4% of ATK that ignores DEF to the enemy every 0.5 sec for 10 sec. This effect will be activated once in 20 sec.
Upon attack, deals P.DMG equal to 4.8% of ATK that ignores DEF to the enemy every 0.5 sec for 10 sec. This effect will be activated once in 20 sec.
Upon attack, deals P.DMG equal to 5.8% of ATK that ignores DEF to the enemy every 0.5 sec for 10 sec. This effect will be activated once in 20 sec.
Upon attack, deals P.DMG equal to 7% of ATK that ignores DEF to the enemy every 0.5 sec for 10 sec. This effect will be activated once in 20 sec.
Upon attack, deals P.DMG equal to 8.4% of ATK that ignores DEF to the enemy every 0.5 sec for 10 sec. This effect will be activated once in 20 sec.
Upon attack, deals P.DMG equal to 10% of ATK that ignores DEF to the enemy every 0.5 sec for 10 sec. This effect will be activated once in 20 sec.
story: Nail ornament of the Abyssal Goddess Xanadus. It is made from an alloy of unknown but special metals.
